TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NamedPipeTransportBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement

summary.span: 表示具名管道傳輸的繫結元素。

span.span: Represents the binding element for the named pipe transport.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個傳輸會使用格式的 Uri"`net.pipe`://`hostname`/`path`"。This transport uses URIs of the form "`net.pipe`://`hostname`/`path`". 其他 URI 元件是選擇性的。Other URI components are optional. 類別是一個起點，用來建立實作具名管道傳輸通訊協定的自訂繫結。The class is the starting point for creating a custom binding that implements the named pipes transport protocol. 這個傳輸用於電腦上的 WCF 通訊。This transport is used for on-machine WCF communication. WCF 服務模型會使用這個類別建立 factory 物件，可實作和介面。The WCF service model uses this class to create factory objects that implement the and interfaces. 然後，這些處理站物件會建立並接受使用具名管道通訊協定傳送 SOAP 訊息的通道。These factory objects then create and accept the channels that transmit SOAP messages using the named pipes protocol. 您可以藉由設定這個類別的屬性來設定其所建立的處理站，例如：。You configure the factories that this class creates by setting its properties, such as: . 您也可以設定基底類別 的屬性，例如：、 和 。You can also set properties on the base class, , such as: , , and . 如需完整的屬性清單，請參閱 。For a complete list of properties, see . 最後，您可以設定 的基底類別 (即 ) 屬性，例如 。Finally, you can set properties on the base class of , which is , such as . 如需完整的屬性清單，請參閱 。For a complete list of properties, see . ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何使用這個類別：This example shows how to use this class: [!code-csharp[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是一個用來複製繫結項目的複製建構函式，而且會公開用來讓衍生類別可以實作 。This method is a copy constructor used to clone the binding element, and is exposed so that derived classes can implement . ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何初始化下列類別的新執行個體： This example shows how to initialize a new instance of the class: [!code-csharp[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以用來建立特定型別的通道處理站 Factory，以便依據傳輸繫結項目的組態傳送訊息。This method can be used to create a channel factory of the specified type for sending messages based on the configuration of the transport binding element. ## Examples 這個範例會說明如何建立指定型別的通道處理站，以用來建立通道：This example shows how to create a channel factory of the specified type that can be used to create channels: [!code-csharp[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是提供用來啟用針對基底位址進行的繫結驗證。This property is provided to enable binding validation against base addresses. ## Examples 下列範例會說明如何取得用於傳輸的 URI 配置：This example shows how to get the URI scheme for the transport: [!code-csharp[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#4)]
